title: Student Protest at VC' G.C Tripathi's  Farewell
description: Students protesting in front of the convoy carrying the Vice Chancellor\, G.C. Tripathi\, when he leaves the BHU campus post his farewell as he retires from his post. After the incident of protest and lathicharge on students in September 2017\, the VC was sent on an indefinite vacation. However\, his term as VC also incidentally ended on the 30th of November\, 2017.

title: Fire at BHU Main Gate
description: A fire blazing in front of the BHU main gate after the protest has been disrupted. During the police action\, the students claimed that it was police and other anti social elements who attacked cars and set them on fire. It was an attempt to justify the lathi charge done by the police on the peaceful protest by female students.
